efileId.description: this is the unique key which identifies the efile

productLineCode.description: Product Line Code of this Efile. For ex., `ACD` or `MAYA`

version.description: Product Major Release. This is typically 4 digit year like `2016` or `2017`

productLanguageCodes.description: Two digit Language code of the product. If this efile is not non language specific sku, then it would be `WW`. For ex., `["EINT"]` or `["FR", "IT"]`

fileDescription.description: Description associated with the efile. This typically describes the efile in customer friendly format. For ex., `Autodesk Design Academy Suite 2015 French Win 32bit` or `Autodesk Entertainment Creation Suite Ultimate 2016 Multilingual Win 64bit`

platform.description: Platform to which this efile is applicable for. Some valid values are `Win 32/64` or `Win 32` or `Win 64` or `Linux 32` or `Linux 64` or `Mac 32` or `Mac 32/64` or `Mac 64`

contentType.description: (Need to understand more about this). For ex., `PSW` or `LP` or `DOC` or `SUP`

fileNameWithPath.description: File name with path. This path is relative to hosting path. For ex., `/NET16SWDLD/2016/PDSPRM/DLM/Autodesk_Plant_Design_Suite_premium_2016_English_Win_64bit_DLM_001_006.sfx.exe` or `/NET16SWDLD/2016/DSADV/WI/ADS_Ultimate_2016_English_Win_32_64bit_WI_en-us_Setup.exe`

packedFileSize.description: Size of the packaged file in bytes.

unpackedFileSize.description: Size of the unpackged file in bytes.

checksum.description: Checksum of the efile. For ex., `B58DF49A675A36DE7027B65B2DA57AB3` or `87E75A92DDF5C859AC353D6B65C2F067`

downloadMethod.description: Supported download method for this efile. For ex., `IN` (Install Now) or `DN` (Download Now) or `BR` (Browser Download) or `DB` (Not sure what this is)

productName.description: Name of the product with which this eFile is associated.
